text: Alynna Alexandra Asistio (born September 27, 1991 in Caloocan City, Philippines) is a Filipina actress. She was a contract artist of GMA Network and moved to ABS-CBN in August 2013. She is known for her roles in the GMA network's shows like the telefantasya Mga Mata ni Anghelita, Who's Your Daddy Now? and La Vendetta.Nadia Montenegro and daughter Alynna Asistio clash on TV rival, pep.ph; accessed April 26, 2015. She appeared on ABS-CBN's drama Minute-to-Win-It. She also appeared on the weekend drama anthology Maalaala Mo Kaya. ==Personal life== She is the daughter of actress Nadia Montenegro and former Caloocan City Mayor, Macario "Boy" Asistio, Jr. and the niece of Hazel Ann Mendoza. Asistio has dated high-profile Philippine actors such as Mark Herras and Derek Ramsay.Eunice Blanco, February 25, 2014 , Philippine Star, Ynna on Mark admitting having a baby: I’m hurting but there’s nothing else I can do, Retrieved May 15, 2015, "...episode of "Startalk," Mak admits about her daughter, ..."Glaiza Jarloc, July 13, 2013, Philippine Sun Star, Ynna Asistio, Mark Herras end romance, Retrieved May 15, 2015, "...actress herself confirmed the split via a text message to ABS-CBN employee ..."Philippine Daily Inquirer, June 1, 2011, Ynna Asistio still bugged by irate fans, Retrieved May 15, 2015, "..Young actress Ynna Asistio, current girlfriend of actor Mark Herras...."Philippine Daily Inquirer, March 3, 2015, Dolly Anne Carvajal, Derek Ramsay finds new love, Retrieved May 15, 2015, "... Ynna Asistio is Derek Ramsay's new squeeze?..." Asistio is of Spanish descent on her mother's side. Asistio lives in Ayala Heights in Quezon City.Marinel R. Cruz, Philippine Daily Inquirer, December 23, 2010, Inquirer Entertainment, A new home for Ynna Asistio, Retrieved May 15, 2015, "...
